detectors.description: DungeonRunBeta.getRunDetails(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#329-396) uses a weak PRNG: now > _monsterCreationTime + monsterFleeTime (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#373)

DungeonRunBeta.attack(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#405-474) uses a weak PRNG: dungeonRunEnded (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#452)

DungeonRunBeta.attack(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#405-474) uses a weak PRNG: currentLevel == 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#426)

DungeonRunBeta.getRunDetails(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#329-396) uses a weak PRNG: monster.level + monsterStrength > _heroHealth (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#375)

DungeonRunBeta.attack(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#405-474) uses a weak PRNG: ! dungeonRunEnded (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#470)

DungeonRunBeta.getRunDetails(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#329-396) uses a weak PRNG: monster.level == 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x06ea256d8a2112aff4f700407e254bae8921811d-DungeonRunBeta.sol#360)
